title: [BUG] ColumnTransformer does not work with a callable as column selector
body:
**Describe the bug**
The ColumnTransformer does not work with a callable as column selector for a transformer, as in sklearn, contrary to the description: 
> column(s) : str or int, array-like of string or int, slice, boolean
        mask array or **callable**

The error is:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File ".venv/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sktime/transformations/panel/compose.py", line 220, in fit_transform
    Xt = super(ColumnTransformer, self).fit_transform(X, y)
  File ".venv/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sklearn/compose/_column_transformer.py", line 714, in fit_transform
    return self._hstack(list(Xs))
  File ".venv/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sktime/transformations/panel/compose.py", line 152, in _hstack
    vars = [y for x in self.transformers for y in x[2]]
  File ".venv/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sktime/transformations/panel/compose.py", line 152, in <listcomp>
    vars = [y for x in self.transformers for y in x[2]]
TypeError: 'make_column_selector' object is not iterable
```


**To Reproduce**
```python
from sktime.datasets import load_UCR_UEA_dataset
from sktime.transformations.panel.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer
from sklearn.compose import make_column_selector

X_train, y_train = load_UCR_UEA_dataset(name="ArrowHead", split="train", return_X_y=True, return_type="pd-multiindex")

column_transformer = ColumnTransformer(
    [
        ("numeric", FunctionTransformer(func=lambda x: x, validate=False), make_column_selector(dtype_include=float)),
    ]
)

column_transformer.fit_transform(X_train, y_train)
```

**Expected behavior**
A ColumnTransformer should accept a callable for column selection.

**Versions**
